content: I made this channel to talk about versions CT software. I’m working with a tool called Catlab.jl right now. It’s pretty cool!
Catlab.jl looks cool. It give me more reason to learn Julia

A topic on functional programming and type theory would be very interesting. I'm specifically interested on functional reactive programming and CT, e.g. what Conal Elliot is doing. Is this stream for software used to do CT or software in general?
I think the intention was that it was category theory-focused software
I was thinking that software at least somewhat related to CT, but taking a pretty broad interpretation
so gripes about powerpoint would be off topic, but anything involving what Conal Elliot is doing would be on topic
Research in functional programming and CT is very broad tho. You may probably want to create a new stream for that, with many different substreams.
Yes, a stream for FP sounds like a good idea
